name: Aksara Jawa
description:
Aksara Jawa is an education game designed for user's to translating Javanese script "Aksara Jawa" into alphabet within a predetermined time.

The purpose of Aksara Jawa game to help the main character named "AKSA" to keep running by destroying the stones blocking the street Aksa, each stone has a question of Javanese script that can be implemented by the user before it touches the stone.

Aksara Jawa | Game Edukasi Menerjemahkan Aksara Jawa
